title: Project Planning and Management
description: Define project scope, objectives, timeline, and resource allocation. Set up project management tools and processes.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct user research, gather requirements from stakeholders, and analyze existing BCI systems and mind-body healing techniques.

title: System Architecture and Design
description: Define the overall system architecture, including hardware and software components, data flow, integration points, and security considerations. Ensure scalability, maintainability, and modularity. Consider edge cases, error handling, performance optimizations, and user experience. Incorporate feedback from stakeholders and subject matter experts.

title: Hardware Development
description: Design and develop the hardware components of the BCI system, such as sensors, electrodes, and neural stimulation devices.

title: Software Development
description: Develop the software components of the BCI system, including signal processing, neural decoding, and user interface.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing user data, session logs, and system configurations.

title: Security and Privacy
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and ensure system integrity, including encryption, access controls, and auditing.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test plans, perform unit, integration, and system testing, and ensure the system meets quality standards.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the production environment, implement continuous integration and deployment pipelines, and monitor system performance.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Develop user manuals, technical documentation, and training materials for end-users and support staff.
